intro: Consolida aucheri, commonly known as the Persian rocket or sweet rocket, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Papaveraceae. It is characterized by its tall, slender stems and clusters of bright yellow or orange flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant produces small, elongated seed pods that contain numerous tiny seeds, which are dispersed by wind. Native to the Mediterranean region, it thrives in well-drained soil and full sun. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and landscapes.
